title: Citi Earns Top Honors in The Asset's Triple A Awards 2012
summary: Hong Kong, Singapore - Citi today announced it has been named Best Transaction Bank in Asia for 2012 by The Asset magazine. The awards illustrate Citi's capability, innovation and continued excellence in the transaction banking sector in Asia Pacific.
tag-1: Citi Earns Top Honors in The Asset's Triple A Awards 2012
tag-2: Hong Kong, Singapore – Citi today announced it has been named Best Transaction Bank in Asia for 2012 by The Asset magazine. The awards illustrate Citi's capability, innovation and continued excellence in the transaction banking sector in Asia Pacific.
tag-3: Citi was also honored with an additional 10 regional awards and nearly 20 country and solution awards recognizing its strength in the local markets and ability to deliver effective, creative and sustainable solutions to clients.
tag-4: "We are extremely proud to have won these prestigious awards and see this as recognition of our growth, innovative spirit and relentless commitment to our clients," commented Anthony Nappi, Citi Asia Pacific Head of Transaction Services. "We believe this is a true validation of our industry-leadership position in the region and we will continue to leverage our capabilities and experience to further develop unparalleled products and services for our clients."
tag-8: The Asset magazine's annual awards, now into their second decade, recognize leadership in the cash management, trade finance and securities and fund services industries among international financial institutions operating in the Asia Pacific region.
tag-9: Citi Transaction Services, a division of Citi's Institutional Clients Group, offers integrated cash management, trade, and securities and fund services to multinational corporations, financial institutions and public sector organizations around the world. With a network that spans more than 95 countries, Citi's Transaction Services supports over 65,000 clients. As of the fourth quarter of 2011, it held on average $368 billion in liability balances and $12.5 trillion in assets under custody.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
